input.sentences: picture of graduate about to receive his diploma .
picture of little nephew with family dog .
picture of graduate with his uncles .
output.sentences: He posed for pictures in his cap and gown.
He proudly walked with his class to receive his diploma.
His little son waited at home to celebrate with him.
His Mother baked him a very special cake for his graduation,
His family celebrated with him, they couldn't be prouder.
